definition: hamani To resist, as water on corrosive things. Dic., ext. mng. Uaki ʻaʻalo wai. Water-resistant watch. Also uāki ʻaʻalo wai. ʻAila ʻaʻalo paʻahau. Antifreeze. ʻAʻalo pili. Teflon. ʻAʻalo wai. Waterproof, water-resistant.

hamani To resist, as water on corrosive things. Dic., ext. mng. Uaki ʻaʻalo wai. Water-resistant watch. Also uāki ʻaʻalo wai. ʻAila ʻaʻalo paʻahau. Antifreeze. ʻAʻalo pili. Teflon. ʻAʻalo wai. Waterproof, water-resistant.

kikino, Nerve.
